description: Representative Brad Sherman asked if Wells Fargo would hold customer suits “to these forced arbitration clauses and screw them again out of their day in court?”
title: ‘I Believe in Arbitration,’ Says Stumpf
title_page: ‘I Believe in Arbitration,’ Says Stumpf - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Representative Brad Sherman asked if Wells Fargo would hold customer suits “to these forced arbitration clauses and screw them again out of their day in court?”
